title: Conformal non-Abelian Thirring models
abstract: The Lie-Poisson structure of non-Abelian Thirring models is discussed and the Hamiltonian quantization of these theories is carried out. The consistency of the Hamiltonian quantization with the path integral method is established. It is shown that the space of non-Abelian Thirring models contains the nonperturbative conformal points which are in one-to-one correspondence with general solutions of the Virasoro master equation. A BRST nature of the mastert equation is clarified.
